snippet.title: FAITH - Pixel Horror Indie Game Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Bug me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/airdorf
Get your MORTIS t-shirt here: https://goo.gl/7AJSoi
Got questions? Ask here: https://ask.fm/Airdorf

Download FAITH here:
https://airdorf.itch.io/faith
https://gamejolt.com/games/faith/287973
http://www.indiedb.com/games/faith1

Teaser Trailer for FAITH, a pixel horror game inspired by the era of MS-DOS, Apple II, and ZX Spectrum games

"It's like The Oregon Trail combined with The Exorcist".

In FAITH, players take on the role of a priest returning to a cursed house months after an exorcism gone horribly wrong.
